scrub:
(:action scrub
    :parameters (?p - player ?b - bottle)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?b) (cleanness ?b dirty))
    :effect (and (cleanness ?b clean) (wetness ?b wet))
)
```

#### Action 2: Place the Funnel
```lisp
place:
(:action place_funnel
    :parameters (?p - player ?f - funnel ?b - bottle)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?f) (at ?p ?b) (location ?f in_drawer))
    :effect (location ?f over_mouth_of_bottle)
)
```

#### Action 3: Pour Pancake Batter
```lisp
(:action place_in_refrigerator
    :parameters (?p - player ?b - bottle ?r - refrigerator)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?b) (location ?b on_counter) (orientation ?b closed_with_lid))
    :effect (and (location ?b in_refrigerator) (temperature ?b cold))
)
```

### Summary
The steps have been translated into PDDL actions with defined parameters, preconditions, and effects based on the entity states provided. Each action captures the necessary conditions and outcomes to complete the task of making a pancake mix container from a recycled ketchup bottle.
(:action pour_batter
    :parameters (?p - player ?f - funnel ?b - bottle ?batter - batter)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?b) (location ?f over_mouth_of_bottle) (emptiness ?b empty))
    :effect (and (emptiness ?b full) (weight ?b heavy))
)
```

#### Action 4: Replace Lid and Label Bottle
```lisp
replace:
(:action replace_lid_and_label
    :parameters (?p - player ?b - bottle ?lid - lid)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?b) (emptiness ?b full) (orientation ?b open))
    :effect (and (orientation ?b closed_with_lid) (clarity ?b written_on))
)
```
